Starstorm/Windlord:

"KUP!!!" Windlord screamed Windlord "WE HAVE TO DEFEND THE SHIP!!!! 
BUT MOST IMPORTANT IS DFEND THOSE NEW COMERS.. HELP CONVOY, IS THE 
NEW ONE WHO'S FIGHTHIN AGAINST THOSE TWO PREDSSS..."

Starstorm transformed and one of her three head dragons (The left 
one) whimpered painfully for the strike while the others hissed and 
spated fourios agains Sabre "WHAT YOU HAVE DONE TO MY PETS, YOU 
RUTLLESS MAXIMAL!!!!! shouted fouriuos Starstorm how has in her arms 
the wounded dragon head "YOU WILL PAY WHAT YOU HAVE DONE TO MY LITTLE 
PET!!!! NightViper is time to your meal... and today you have a 
special dish... A Transmetal Hawk named Windlord..."

The others head hissed fourious and moved as angered snakes ready to 
atttack. Starstorm aimed and shot 14 times against Wingrazor's back  
and 11 against Sabre

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "dishpanhandninja" <foxmanroar1@a...> 
wrote:
> Rave Motioned to the new comer. "Get Down Man!" "Theres a battle 
> going on here!"
> 
> WingRazor the BeastMachine Eagle fought Phenoix as NightViper 
> defended Starstorm, and convoy held up to other preds...
